reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and appreciate its beautiful pattern that matches across all seams.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning, warm and eco friendly!
items.body: I get lots of complements on it. I worried about it being scratchy, but the liner prevents the wool from aggravating the skin. It is very warm and heavy, perfect for fall and even winter days, mire like a coat than sweater. I have not washed it yet, and if I have to I will probably give it to dry-cleaners. The pattern looks beautiful and also photographs very well. It doesn’t seem like it will fuzz up, what makes the price of it totally worth it. Seems like it will last for a very long time. I’m 5’10 with a slim torso. The length of size M seems great. I live the collar. I also like the fact that I can roll up the bottom if the sweater under and make it look great with high waist jeans. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars In love
items.body: Love this sweater. It is so warm and cozy. It is well made. I got an extra large so it’s a little big but i like it a little baggy. It is wool so it is a little scratchy but i usually wear a long sleeve shirt underneath it anyway. I think it will just get softer with time and wear. Read more
items.author: vexxywil

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Epic Sweater
items.body: The craftsmanship is amazing. The wool is very dense brioche stitch. It is so heavy that it could/should be worn like a jacket. The fit is quite over sized but that is a good thing because someone is more likely to wear long sleeves under it because it is 100 percent wool. Sometimes I wash my dry clean only wool clothes by hand at home but I am unwilling to take the chance with this one-I can tell that it would definitely shrink if wet. I was considering knitting this pattern myself but it was on sale and thought it would be worthwhile to wear and use as a reference, especially considering the time and cost of materials. If someone preferred a lighter sweater, hated wool, or worried about ruining this sweater, a knock off of this pattern might suffice. It’s somewhat deceiving —the way it’s worn in the movie. The sweater is such high quality and woolly that I would never think of wearing it with a T-shirt and PJ bottoms. Read more
items.author: daydreambeliever27

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm!
items.body: I adore this sweater. I live in Michigan and it can get bitter cold. Today was a balmy 35 degrees and I used this sweater as a coat. Worked great. Also really enjoy the double zip feature. For reference, I’m 5’4, 170 and I got the XL. Fits perfect. I do have to say, I’m a little disappointed that the sweater is “pilling” under the arms after just 3 times wearing. Maybe that’s what lamb wool is supposed to do? I can live with it, seeing I will have this for decades. Don’t hesitate to buy this. This is a piece that can be passed on to kids and grands if you take good care of it. You’ll also get a lot of people smiling at you when you wear it, but that just my opinion, man! Read more
items.author: Jackie Sirianni

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater really ties my look together.
items.body: This is a sweater for a serious individual. It's truly the heaviest, most well-made item of clothing I own now. I can see how people have Pendleton sweaters for decades because they're built to last. I bought this because of the Lebowski connection, but surprisingly the two people who commented on it had no idea what that meant, they just admired the fact that it "must be a Pendleton." I did notice one review stating that the fabric was itchy, but I didn't find that to be an issue for me. Overall, I feel like this was a great investment. Read more
items.author: DMoore

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived stained and well used
items.body: Pendleton always makes beautiful items that are warm and high quality. My issue here is that the sweater was advertised as a retun: "Condition: Used - Like New Minimal signs of wear, consistent with being tried on but not used. Item may not come in original packaging." Once received, the sweater has a large stain on the front pocket, substantial pilling under the arms, and there was hair on it. This was not a like new item but rather a well used item that was returned. Went to Amazon for help and unfortunately, no replacement was available for it. They offered an additional discount and I will try to take out the stain, but buyer beware. No information available for the seller either. Read more
items.author: BD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big…order 2 sizes down.
items.body: I am 5’5” and weigh 165lbs. I normally wear a large but based on the reviews of others, I ordered 2 sizes down and it fits just the way I like it. It’s definitely more like a coat than a sweater, very warm. Read more
items.author: Candace Gainey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really ties the outfit together, man.
items.body: Absolutely in love with this sweater; it has pockets and a slightly longer style. It was like Christmas Day when it arrived in the mail today. I’m 5’5” 125 lbs and the XS fit perfectly, not a lot of room for layers, but that’s how I like it. Read more
items.author: heybelinduhhhh

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan/Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
